Spiider, a superbright next generation of LED WashBeam luminaires, using 18 x 40 Watt and 1 x 60 Watt LEDs and combining it with a very efficient 12,5 :1 zoom optical system ranging from tight 4° Beam to wide 50° Wash, makes the product in its class the most powerful LED fixture on the market. Now equipped with Robe's innovative lens coating technology which brings benefits such as bright and clear lenses, no scratches or marks, higher light output and longer intervals between cleaning.
